author: hossman
msg: SOLR-7461: stats.field now supports individual local params for 'countDistinct' and 'distinctValues', 'calcdistinct' is still supported as an alias for both options

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-4330 simplified process failure detection. A non-AP process is considered as CROAKED when it terminates unexpectedly.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Referencing: DefaultConversion.specialize(...) method should accepts a MathTransformFactory argument.
This factory was previously hidden because it was used only for axis swapping or scaling.
But we will need also for creating a MathTransform when the defining conversion has been created with
only a ParameterValueGroup instance (no MathTransform instance), in which case the need to control
the MathTransformFactory instance to use become clearer.
